data.title: Transports publics fribourgeois
data.meta_description: At “Comptoir de la Veveyse” fair (October 2019 - Chatel Saint Denis), Trio agency (Lausanne) mandated by TPF indroduced to the public the renovation projects of the region through two interactive tables.
data.text:
During the La Veveyse fair, Fribourg Public Transportation (TPF) introduced on its 70 sqm booth, their various train stations projects to the public.

The purpose was to make the public understand what are the stakes of such important works on the train-stations around Chatel Saint-Denis and what are the next plans.

In order to better visualize the work carried out, TPF presented elements on an interactive table.

The app introduced the region and its various changes throughout videos, pictures and explicative documents.

The software being multi-user multi touch, visitors could use in a simultaneous way the table to find multiple information.

Visitors were able to have a look on several projects by station and by theme. Some of them were looking for information on real estate projects while others were able to find future train connections.

To find out more about this project, consult Trio Agency press release.
